headline: Help HN: Can't Open Childhood Files
description:
Hello HN, I was clearing my old house and got a box with a 100+ 3½ floppy disks. All except one working!

Among others I got DisplayWriter 4.0, OS/4 Warp Slovenian, dBase IV, Clipper, PowerPoint 4.0, Netscape Navigator 3.0, etc.

I found also some files with .CHT and .IMG extension which I can't find any software to open them. I know I made them, but unfortunately I can't remember which software was used. There is my family tree and chart of my height growing (which I'd like to compare now with my kids).

Some files I uploaded here: https://github.com/twooclock/KdajBi/tree/main/cht_img Files timestamp is 1990 and 1991.

Please help me find appropriate software!

So far I tried (does not work): -ABC Flowcharter 3.01 -IBM Storyboard Plus 1.01 (5.25) -Harvard Graphics for Windows 4.0 -Harvard Graphics for Windows 2.0 (3.5) -HarvardGraphicsViewer -PowerPoint 98

Googled, checked file.org, WinWorld, ... loosing hope... really makes me think about digital preservation.

Thank you!
headline_zh-Hans: 帮助HN：无法打开童年的文件
headline_zh-Hant: 幫助HN：無法打開童年的文件
description_zh-Hans:
你好，HN。 我在清理我的老房子时，得到了一个装有100多张3½软盘的盒子。除了一张能用外，其余的都能用！

在其他的软盘中，我得到了DisplayWriter 4.0、OS/4 Warp Slovenian、dBase IV、Clipper、PowerPoint 4.0、Netscape Navigator 3.0等等。

我还发现了一些扩展名为.CHT和.IMG的文件，但我找不到任何软件来打开它们。我知道这些文件是我做的，但不幸的是，我不记得用的是哪个软件。这里有我的家谱和我的身高增长图（我现在想和我的孩子们进行比较）。

我在这里上传的一些文件：https://github.com/twooclock/KdajBi/tree/main/cht_img 文件的时间戳是1990年和1991年。

请帮助我找到合适的软件！

到目前为止，我试过（不工作）。 -ABC Flowcharter 3.01 -IBM Storyboard Plus 1.01 (5.25) -Harvard Graphics for Windows 4.0 -Harvard Graphics for Windows 2.0 (3.5) -HarvardGraphicsViewer -PowerPoint 98

Googled, checked file.org, WinWorld, ... loosing hope... really makes me think about digital preservation.

Thank you!
